title: Categorical Clustering Strategies for Incidental Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundation in social science knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Categorization-based design strategy development to maximize incidental learning effects for mid-level social studies learners in mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify incidental learning materials by applying three or more category clustering techniques
Learners can categorize social issue datasets presented in mobile environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can visually represent relationships between categories discovered during incidental learning through project deliverables
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
